com.googlecode.tesseract.android

Class TessPdfRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.tesseract.android.TessPdfRenderer

  • public class TessPdfRenderer
extends Object
    Java representation of a native Tesseract PDF renderer

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TessPdfRenderer(TessBaseAPI baseApi, String outputPath)
      Constructs an instance of a Tesseract PDF renderer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getNativePdfRenderer() 
      void recycle()
      Releases resources and frees any memory associated with this TessPdfRenderer object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TessPdfRenderer

        public TessPdfRenderer(TessBaseAPI baseApi,
                       String outputPath)
        Constructs an instance of a Tesseract PDF renderer. When the instance of TessPdfRenderer is no longer needed, its recycle() method must be invoked to dispose of it.
        Parameters:
        baseApi - API instance to use for performing OCR
        outputPath - Full path to write the resulting PDF to, not including the ".pdf" extension

    • Method Detail

      • getNativePdfRenderer

        public long getNativePdfRenderer()
        Returns:
        A pointer to the native TessPdfRenderer object.

      • recycle

        public void recycle()
        Releases resources and frees any memory associated with this TessPdfRenderer object. Must be called on object destruction.
